title: I don't remember my old email to change it.
body:
This account was made a long time ago and I used a different email than my real one because I didn't want spam, but now I want to change it but I don't know how to log onto that email I used for this account.
Anyway to change it or is it stuck like that?

replies.body: You can reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and one of our account specialists will be happy to help you change the email associated with your account. ^.^

You can change your email in your settings. At the top right corner of the website, you can hover over your username and select "Settings." From there, it will list the email currently associated with your account. If you click "Change Email," it will allow you to do so. You just need to provide your password and a new email address.
But I need my password for my old email account which I don't know
